title: Cathedral of Piura
description: The Cathedral of Piura is a historical landmark that dates back to the colonial era. It features beautiful architecture and is a must-see for visitors.

title: Plaza de Armas
description: The Plaza de Armas is the heart of Piura, featuring beautiful architecture and vibrant activity. It's a great place to relax and enjoy the local atmosphere.

title: Piura Art Museum
description: The Piura Art Museum showcases a diverse collection of art from local and international artists. It's a cultural hub for art enthusiasts.

title: Piura Market
description: The Piura Market is a bustling hub of activity where you can find fresh produce, handmade crafts, and local delicacies.

title: University of Piura
description: The University of Piura is a prestigious institution offering a variety of programs and degrees. It's known for its beautiful campus and academic excellence.

title: Piura Beach
description: Piura Beach offers stunning views of the ocean and is a popular destination for both locals and tourists. Enjoy sunbathing, swimming, and beach sports.

title: Piura Shopping Mall
description: The Piura Shopping Mall is a modern retail center with a wide range of stores, restaurants, and entertainment options.

title: Piura Botanical Garden
description: The Piura Botanical Garden is a serene oasis featuring a variety of plant species, walking paths, and picnic areas.
